contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |name = ''Quararibea jefensis'' |status = CR |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plantae]] |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] |ordo = [[Malvales]] |familia = [[Malvaceae]] |genus = ''[[Quararibea]]'' |species = '''''Q. jefensis''''' |binomial = ''Quararibea jefensis'' |binomial_authority = Robyns & Nilsson |}} '''''Quararibea jefensis''''' is a species of [[flowering plant]] in the [[Bombacaceae]] family. It is found only in [[Panama]]. It is threatened by [[habitat loss]]. ==Source== * MitrÃ©, M. 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/32678/all Quararibea jefensis].
